Elenilson de Godoy Alves Filho

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7843055136220699
  • Última atualização do currículo em 04/09/2019

I developed undergraduate researches in two analytical chemistry areas in UFG (Universidade Federal de Goiás): essential oils by GC-MS; and atomic absorption using spectrophotometer, both coupled to chemometrics. Furthermore, I was monitor in organic chemistry in UFG. My master's degree was carried out also in UFG applied to quantification and chemometrics analysis by NMR. I developed a PhD research in UFSCar (Universidade Federal de São Carlos) applied to qNMR, chemometrics, and HPLC-UV-SPE-NMR, as well as a PhD Sandwich at University of Toronto applied to HPLC-(UV/MS)-SPE-Gilson-NMR and CMP-NMR probe. I developed postdoctoral researches at Federal University of Ceara partnership with Embrapa Agroindustria Tropical in food science by qNMR, GC-MS, HPLC-MS, all coupled to chemometrics. Nowadays, I'm Professor at Federal University of Ceara in Food Engineering Department. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outras informações relevantes

 
Experiência na avaliação quimiométrica (exploratória, classificatória e regressão multivariada) de dados adquiridos por Ressonância Magnética Nuclear (RMN), Cromatografia Gasosa acoplada a Espectrometria de Massas (GC-MS), HPLC (cromatografia Líquida de Alta Eficiência) acoplada a luz UV ou MS.
Experiência na quantificação utilizando a RMN.
